projects.title: Kuvera Crypto Bot
projects.shortDescription: Automated crypto trading bot with smart strategies, real-time market data, and both testnet/live profits.
projects.description: Advanced automated cryptocurrency trading bot built with Node.js and TypeScript. Features intelligent trading strategies, real-time market data analysis, and secure API integration with Binance. The system operates on both testnet and live environments, delivering consistent monthly profits through algorithmic trading strategies. Optimized for security, reliability, and performance with comprehensive error handling and risk management.
features: Automated trading strategies with risk management
Real-time market data analysis and decision making
Secure API integration with multiple exchanges
Comprehensive logging and performance tracking
Both testnet and live trading environments
projects.impact: Consistent monthly crypto profits for personal and client portfolios

projects.title: Realtaste Restaurant Platform
projects.shortDescription: Modern ordering, feedback, and analytics platform for restaurants with digital menus and table-side ordering.
projects.description: Comprehensive restaurant management platform built with React and Next.js. Features digital menu management, table-side ordering system, customer feedback collection, and detailed analytics dashboards. The platform streamlines restaurant operations while enhancing customer experience through modern UI/UX design and real-time order processing.
features: Digital menu management with real-time updates
Table-side ordering system for customers
Customer feedback and review collection
Admin dashboard with analytics and reporting
Real-time order tracking and kitchen management
projects.impact: Improved customer experience and operational efficiency for partner restaurants

projects.title: Echo Journal AI Habit Tracker
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered journal and habit-tracking app with personalized insights and automated reminders.
projects.description: Intelligent habit tracking and journaling application powered by AI. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility, the app provides personalized insights, automated reminders, and behavior suggestions based on user patterns. Features advanced analytics to help users build better routines and track their progress over time.
features: AI-powered personalized insights and recommendations
Automated habit reminders and progress tracking
Advanced analytics and behavior pattern analysis
Cross-platform mobile application
Secure data synchronization across devices
projects.impact: Helped users build better routines and track progress effectively

projects.title: BillGen ERP CRM
projects.shortDescription: Secure dealership billing & CRM system with PDF generation, encrypted client info, and reporting dashboards.
projects.description: Comprehensive ERP and CRM system designed for auto dealerships. Features secure billing with PDF generation, encrypted client information storage, and detailed reporting dashboards. Built with React and Node.js, the system streamlines dealership operations while maintaining high security standards for sensitive customer data.
features: Secure billing system with PDF generation
Encrypted client information storage
Comprehensive CRM with customer management
Advanced reporting and analytics dashboards
GDPR compliance and data protection
projects.impact: Automated billing for auto dealerships, reduced admin time by 60% for one client

projects.title: P.U.L.S.E. â€“ AI Agent Framework
projects.shortDescription: An AI-powered personal workflow assistant with multi-model capabilities and GitHub integration.
projects.description: P.U.L.S.E. (Prime Uminda's Learning System Engine) is a CLI-based AI orchestrator inspired by J.A.R.V.I.S., built to automate tasks like time queries and code debugging. Powered by Mistral-Small via OpenRouter, it uses MongoDB Atlas for chat persistence and pytz for accurate time zone handling (e.g., Sri Lanka's UTC+5:30). I overcame asynchronous API call failures by implementing SQLite caching, optimizing for my 8GB RAM setup. Key features include intent routing and a scalable multi-model system.
features: Multi-model AI system with specialized models for different tasks
Long-term memory with vector database for semantic search
GitHub integration for repository management and commit assistance
Adaptive neural router for query classification and model selection
Offline capabilities with local model support
projects.impact: Automated personal workflow and development tasks, improving productivity

projects.title: YT Contest Platform
projects.shortDescription: A YouTube contest platform with automated metrics tracking and contestant management.
projects.description: Created a streamlined platform for managing YouTube talent contests with automated metrics tracking and contestant management. The system integrates with YouTube's API to verify submissions, track engagement metrics, and manage the contest lifecycle. Built with Next.js 14 and Supabase, it provides a seamless experience for both contestants and administrators.
features: YouTube API integration for video metrics and playlist management
Community video contests with admin dashboard
Voting system and contest lifecycle management
WhatsApp integration for contestant communication
Subscriber verification system
projects.impact: Streamlined contest management for content creators and communities
